"A.P.238/4/9/12:00": "Mm, seems like there's a slightly stronger enemy ahead."
"でもまあ、リサとあなたの手にかかれば、さくさくっと倒して終わりになりますよお."
"By the way, Lisa had something to ask you."
"Don't read too much into this. It's a simple question."
"For someone else? For yourself, maybe for revenge? Or is there something else?"
"Well, I don't really care. Forget I asked."
"Lisa trusts her own eyes, but she has no idea what to think when she looks at you."
"That's why I've been keeping an eye on you, but Lisa's still confused."
"But I don't have to understand. If I don't understand, I'll just watch you closer than ever."
"Ah, 答えはいりませんよお? 答えがわかっちゃったらつまらなくなっちゃいます."
"For now, Lisa just wants to enjoy this funny feeling."
"The time we've spent talking proves you're different from the others. It sets my heart racing."
"Well, Lisa's still going to win. Heheh, heheheh."
